headline: Waters Acquires Halo Labs, Expanding Biological Analysis Portfolio
summary: Waters Corporation (NYSE:WAT) today announced that it has acquired Halo Labs™, an innovator of specialized imaging technologies to detect, identify, and count interfering materials (particles) in therapeutic products, such as cell, protein, and gene therapies.

headline: Waters Corporation acquired Optofluidics, Inc.
summary: Waters Corporation acquired Optofluidics, Inc. on May 21, 2025.Waters Corporation completed the acquisition of Optofluidics, Inc. on May 21, 2025....
